mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into algresult (releaseId, algName1, algName2, score1, score2, winAlgname, iffinal) values (#{releaseid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{algname1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{algname2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{winalgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iffinal,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update algresult set releaseId = #{releaseid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, algName1 = #{algname1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, algName2 = #{algname2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score1 = #{score1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score2 = #{score2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, winAlgname = #{winalgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, iffinal = #{iffinal,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, releaseId, algName1, algName2, score1, score2, winAlgname, iffinal from algresult
select * from algresult where winalgname is null
select winalgname from algresult where releaseid = #{releaseid} and iffinal is null
select id from algresult where releaseid = #{releaseid} and iffinal is null
mapper.update: UPDATE algresult set score1 = #{score1},score2 = #{score2} where id = #{id}
update algresult set winalgname = #{winalgname} where id = #{id}
update algresult set iffinal = #{iffinal} where id = #{id}
